Package com.colinalworth.celltable.columns.client

Interface Summary
Columns<T> Simplifies creation of Column objects for a CellTable.
ColumnsWithFactory<T,F> Works exactly like Columns, except that a factory type (and instance) may be specified.
DataConverter<M,C> Allows Cell instances generated from Columns interfaces to accept a different datatype than the bean used in the CellTable provides.
 

Class Summary
HasDataFlushableEditor<T> Extended version of com.google.gwt.editor.client.adapters.HasDataEditor.
 

Enum Summary
Columns.Alignment.HorizontalAlign  
Columns.Alignment.VerticalAlign  
 

Annotation Types Summary
Columns.Alignment Sets the alignment of the Column, as would be done using setVerticalAlignment and setHorizontalAlignment.
Columns.ConvertedWith Allows a type implementing DataConverter to be provided which will accept data from the get method this Column is mapped to and transform it before passing it the Cell instance and back again.
Columns.Editable Marks the Column as Editable, so a FieldUpdater will be created and used to call the matching set method for the property this column is assigned to.
Columns.Header Sets a static string to be used as the header of the column to be generated.
Columns.Sortable Indicates that the Column should be set as sortable for the client.
